pre.description: If letters is true, start and end range must include letters

guard.description: If letters is true, start and end range must include letters

pre.description: If numbers is true, start and end range must include numbers

guard.description: If numbers is true, start and end range must include numbers

pre.description: If both letters and numbers are true, start and end range must include letters or numbers

guard.conditionText: letters && numbers ? (start <= 90 && end >= 65) || (start <= 122 && end >= 97) || (start <= 57 && end >= 48) : true
guard.description: If both letters and numbers are true, start and end range must include letters or numbers

pre.description: If letters is true and chars is null, start and end range must include letters

guard.conditionText: letters && chars == null ? (start <= 90 && end >= 65) || (start <= 122 && end >= 97) : true
guard.description: If letters is true and chars is null, start and end range must include letters

pre.description: If numbers is true and chars is null, start and end range must include numbers

guard.description: If numbers is true and chars is null, start and end range must include numbers

pre.description: If both letters and numbers are true and chars is null, start and end range must include letters or numbers

guard.conditionText: letters && numbers && chars == null ? (start <= 90 && end >= 65) || (start <= 122 && end >= 97) || (start <= 57 && end >= 48) : true
guard.description: If both letters and numbers are true and chars is null, start and end range must include letters or numbers

pre.description: Width must be between 0 and 1000 to prevent long strings

guard.description: Width must be between 0 and 1000 to prevent long strings
